column1: landmark_palouse_falls;§YPalouse Falls§!\nA massive waterfall carries the Palouse River into the gorge to the Snake. Although the sight is beautiful
column2: more than a few travelers have met their end falling off the sheer cliffs.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: black_cross_DESC;The Black Cross are a loosely organized collective of insular communities
column2: travelling bard-preachers
column3: and militant heresiarchs who share a belief in the “Straight-Edged Path” in rebellion against a figure only known as “the Man”
column4: who they believe imprisoned the mother-goddesses Anarkee and Gaia in the Event. The Straight-Edged Path mandates abstination from drugs
column5: alcohol
column6: and premarital sex
column7: a path that they believe will lead to freeing of the Mothers from the Man’s control. Black Crossers bear a particular opposition to the rearing of livestock
column8: and often seek to destroy the practice through force.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or “The Brotherhood” is the name commonly used to refer to a group of Chicano Christians in the interior Pacific Northwest. Far from the Mexican heartland
column3: the Meseteño have merged Mexican Christianity with a reverence for saints of agriculture and labor
column4: believing that kings should work the fields besides their subjects.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: dominionist_DESC;Dominionists are a particularly fundimentalist and militant branch of Protestant Christianity
column2: emerging in the decades before the Event
column3: but solidifying their power in the Inland Northwest in the years after. Dominionists believe that America fell due to its degradation by unbelievers and agents of Communism. They believe that America can only be restored through the strict application of Biblical law and the destruction of all who they deem oppose Christ and America.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sovereignist_DESC;The Sovereignists are a religious movement who emerged shortly before the Event
column2: who believe that the day-to-day state of man is a lie
column3: and one’s true self can only be obtained through a combination of ritual ceremonies and incantations known as Asseveration. Upon Asseveration
column4: Sovereignists believe the soul will become Redeemed and become able to tap into a spirit realm known as the Treasury to gain wealth and power. ;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: millenarian_DESC;These are the followers of a lost Guru
column2: a follower of the Guru Christ. The Millenarians believe that the Event was a cleansing of the earth in preparation for Christ’s return
column3: which will occur at the latest in 2239 -- 6000 years after the creation of the earth
column4: by the Jewish tradition
column5: and thus the start of the Seventh Millennium. A Millennial Sabbath.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mine_cultist_DESC;The Mine Cult is a name assigned to a variety of cults and pseudo-faiths that sprang sometimes independently around the Rocky Mountains. They revere the massive mines left by their forefathers
column2: the heritage of the Rocky Mountain Miner
column3: and the great wealth those mines provide. The Mine Cult dogma is inconsistent
column4: but most Mine Cultists believe that it is their duty to strike the earth as their fathers had
column5: and that one day
column6: upon finding their pantheon's head
column8: He Who Bust's will shall be made manifest
column9: and he will deplete the last deposits

column1: mine_cultist_reformed_DESC;The Mine Cult is a name assigned to a variety of cults and pseudo-faiths that sprang sometimes independently around the Rocky Mountains. They revere the massive mines left by their forefathers
column2: the heritage of the Rocky Mountain Miner
column3: and the great wealth those mines provide. The Mine Cult dogma is inconsistent
column4: but most Mine Cultists believe that it is their duty to strike the earth as their fathers had
column5: and that one day
column6: upon finding their pantheon's head
column8: He Who Bust's will shall be made manifest
column9: and he will deplete the last deposits
column11: and "lay off" their holy miners. The codes and traditions of the Mine Cultists have been codified into a book entitled "The Operator's Manual".;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conservationist_DESC;In the Wild Wilderness of California
column2: lay the men and women of the Rangers of Muir
column3: a dedicated force of individuals who continue to recite the ancient creed of "Conservation"
column4: to this they maintain ranger camps across the California watching for the siren calls of the Dark Cicada which will herald the fires that are believed to have consumed the old world.  As stated from one of their patron deities the Guardian of the Woods
column5: Smokey "Only you can prevent Wildfires"...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: The Keshians believe in the rejection of materiality and violence
column3: and understanding the necessity of communion for the maintenance of universal peace. Even if the teachings of Guru Le Guin form the basis of their practices
column4: followers often speak of many others.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: refulgent_DESC;The Refulgents are a collection of groups that worship Fire in many forms
column2: seeing it as the most powerful Force of Nature. Refulgents see themselves as stewards
column3: seeking to maintain balance with the world around them by carefully tending to Fire
column4: feeding it that which is necessary so that it may do its work but containing it from spreading wantonly. Fire destroys all in it's path but in doing so gives room for new life to grow strong
column5: this cycle is vital to Refulgents
column6: who see it as the truest law of nature
column7: the old dies so that the new can thrive. They extend this law to themselves in the form of complex rituals
column8: where they build effigies and temples and burn them to symbolically cleanse themselves as the land around them is cleansed.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: fidelii_DESC;All has been lost. A thousand cities were put to the sword during the fall
column2: the Fifty Tribes of Old America were broken and devoured by dark treachery and unholy brimstone. The only followers of the ancient creed that remain are the few
column3: the proud. Their foes curse them and call them devil dogs
column4: but these grim hero-cultists know themselves only as the All-Faithful. Around their barrack fires and hearths they tell the tales of Old America
column5: where steel-clad citizen-soldiers cast down their foes from half the world away
column6: where winged armor split the heavens in two with thunder and rained down burning lances upon the heads of the enemy. Whatever is left must be protected. It is left to the Fidelii to enforce the Laws of the Old Founders until a new President and Chief-of-Armys may be selected
column7: whenever that may be. Haec Protegimus.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: #Their localization exists elsewhere already so yee haw
adventist_DESC;These are the followers of a most unusual Guru
column2: Guru Miller. They believe that Christ is judging all people actively
column3: and has been since before the event
column4: in preparation of his coming. Unlike the Postadventists
column5: whose movement swept through the lands of the far east
column6: these Adventists do not believe that the Event was Christ’s judgement of the world – and denounce the concept as a most vile deception. They also observe the Sabbath of the Jews
column7: instead of that of their fellow Christians
column8: and believe that death is a dreamless sleep
column9: that only the faithful will ever awaken from.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: #Their localization exists elsewhere already so yee haw
baptist_DESC;The Baptists have always held a prominent position in America
column2: and they persisted in their beliefs through the apocalypse. Their defining creed being that one must choose to follow Christ – they cannot simply be born into it. They practice baptism
column3: by immersion
column4: but only for the believer – and can an infant be said to be a believer in anything? The teachings of many Gurus are allowed within their walls
column5: to help every man find their own path to Christ
column6: through their own reading of scripture.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: #Their localization exists elsewhere already so yee haw
congregationalist_DESC;These Congregationalists reject the Baptist church
column2: and all organized churches
column3: as inherently being infringements on the believer’s ability to find their own path to Christ in the scriptures alone.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: pentecostal_DESC;In the wake of the event
column2: a Guru lost to time spoke of the need for those who recognized the Charismata of the modern day to band together in their time of crisis
column3: founding a unified church for the faithful. Rebirth
column4: Sanctification
column5: and for many of the lucky faithful
column6: the True Baptism of Fire would evidence a man’s journey towards perfection in God.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: oneness_DESC;Some who profess faith in the modern Charismata rejected the Holy Trinity
column2: held fast to by the vast majority of Christian faithful
column3: as little more than polytheism. They believe that Christ is One
column4: not Three
column5: and that the Father
column6: Son
column7: and Holy Spirit are merely titles
column8: not “persons.” They were rejected by the Charismatic Guru’s new church
column9: and so they have formed their own.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: holiness_DESC;Some who initially followed the Charismatic Guru would stray from their path
column2: rejecting the Charismata and the Baptism of Fire as little more than false sorcery.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: freighter_DESC;Long before the Event sank old America into a state of warfare and infighting, the Freighters stood guard over the ports of the West Coast, and protected the exotic goods and resources from around the world that allowed the old Americans to live a life of comfort and ease. However, even as the lives of untold millions are unsteadied in the current age, nobles and commoners alike still depend on the flow of sea, however fickle, trickling in from across the Pacific to improve their meager lives. Thus, the Freighters hold onto their old posts, and claim that they alone possess the knowledge and skills to protect the ocean trade, as they have done since time immemorial.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
GOD_OLD_MAN_SEA;The Old Man of the Sea;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
blackfish_DESC;Central to the faith of the Whalers is The Blackfish; a colossal slumbering god from which all the fish and cetaceans were once born
column2: who in anger at the coming extinction of his children woke to strike down the old world and bring life back to the sea. Follows of the Blackfish all centre their lives around the water in some way; sailing the currents and straights of the North Pacific like great highways
column3: cultivating and nurturing the creatures in the shallows
column4: and erecting weirs to shepherd the salmon and oolichan. They embark on great hunts for the gifts of the Blackfish whose meat and oils their societies rely upon
column5: bringing in Grey Whales
column6: Humpbacks

column1: kuksu_DESC;Despite the many Great Calamities against these people
column2: it could be said for the First Peoples of Pomo
column3: Patwin
column4: Maidu
column5: Ohlone
column6: Miwok rose above the ashes renewed in their shared veneration of Kuksu
column7: whom they believes lives in the far south and healed California so that she may once more provide great bounty to all peoples once again providing new guidance to his children. It is said that other gods sleep in the other cardinal directions waiting for the children of Kuksu to sing their songs and weave their stories in baskets and dances once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kuksu_reformed_DESC;Despite the many Great Calamities against these people
column2: it could be said for the First Peoples of Pomo
column3: Patwin
column4: Maidu
column5: Ohlone
column6: Miwok rose above the ashes renewed in their shared veneration of Kuksu
column7: whom they believes lives in the far south and healed California so that she may once more provide great bounty to all peoples once again providing new guidance to his children. It is said that other gods sleep in the other cardinal directions waiting for the children of Kuksu to sing their songs and weave their stories in baskets and dances once more. The Traditions of the Kuksu people have been codified into a series of sacred stories.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: three_paths_DESC;America has always been a melting pot of culture and ideas
column2: nowhere is this more true than Southern California where people from across the sea brought the three great teachings of Confucius
column3: Buddha
column4: and Laozi.  Despite a diverse background
column5: the similarities in doctrine and ethics allowed a harmonious coexistance.  All follow the way of their respective teacher representing a path to enlightenment.  As such
column6: worship of gods and deities is secondary to self-improvement and pursuit of perfection.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: zenist_DESC;Under its many great teachers rose the powerful yoga arts supposed effort to master the many arts from: Fire Yoga
column2: Buddhafield
column3: Karmic
column4: and Aerobics can grant you powerful aura of "Nirvana" and raises your spirit to high levels of Chi. They claim Chi can only be achieved by strictly adhering to these tenets.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: nirodhist_DESC;As The Event rippled throughout the Land
column2: a new spiritual movement gain traction as the way to "liberate" all people from the "suffering". Nirodhist movement identify the world as Samsara
column3: a machination of a greater being
column4: where everyone live in a circle of constant rebirth. Their villification of the world
column5: and nihilistic practices drew harsh criticism from other followers of Buddha.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: sikh_DESC;Coming from the land of the Punjab in the distant land of Bharata
column2: the Sikh religion sees itself as the universal religion that teaches the ultimate truth of god and unifies all believers
column3: freeing them from falsehood.  The Sikhs follow a succession of 10 Gurus
column4: with the line ending at the living guru in the form of the Guru Granth Sahib. Sikhs uphold a rigid code of conduct which includes wearing symbolic articles called the "five K's" and following the four prohibitions which make one into a Khalsa
column5: a true member of the Sikh community.  By stressing universality and outreach
column6: the Sikhs brought many into their fold noting the same
column7: one god was worshiped by all from Bharata.;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: mainline_DESC;The Mainline church is the union of several ancient churches
column2: whose sisterhood dates to the founding of America itself. Many creeds and Gurus coexist within this church
column3: following Gurus as diverse as Luther
column4: Calvin
column5: and Wesley. The binding doctrines holding these churches together is the need for the church to uplift all men
column6: eliminating the evils of the world and bring everyone to the teachings of Christ
column7: and for all men to be personally involved in their church.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: puritan_DESC;Followers of Guru Calvin. Believing that cooperating with false Gurus is a fraudulent virtue
column2: and that the Mainline church has fallen into the heresy of Modernism
column3: the post-Event Puritans reject ecumenism and have set up their own Presbyteries.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: pietist_DESC;Followers of Guru Luther. Rejecting ritualism
column2: and the need to focus outwards
column3: Pietists instead focus internally
column4: on those already faithful and on their own circumstances
column5: spiritual and physical
column6: instead of those outside the faith.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: apostolic_DESC;The Armenian Apostolic Faith is one of the oldest faiths in Christendom
column2: founded by the Apostles Bartholomew and Thaddeus. They are miaphysite believing Christ to have one nature where both the divine and human are united. After the event the Armenian Apostolic Community of California found itself separated from the Mother Church. In an attempt to stay united a church council was held in the Cathedral of Saint Leon and the Catholicosate of Los Angeles was established.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: paraktelic_DESC;After the Council of Cathedral of Saint Leon was held some Armenian Apostolics refused to acknowledge its decision
column2: proclaiming the reigning Catholicos unworthy of leading the faithful. The Armenian Paraktelics see their faith as the true conintuation of the church founded by the Apostles Bartholomew and Thaddeus. All those outside the church are hetanosner and are not to be asscociated with.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cosmist_DESC;The Cosmists revere the divine spirit of the Universe. They see "Mother Earth" as but a small fragment of humanity's true benefactor. The vast expanse surrounding humanity all plays a role in giving Earth light
column2: heat
column3: minerals
column4: energy
column5: direction
column6: inspiration
column7: and imagination. The Physicists -- those who could truly understand and appreciate its vastness
column8: and learn the secrets hidden within -- were great men who lived before the Event. They are gone now

column2: those who sought to maintain the structures of the old provincial government became know as the Legislators. They maintain some semblance of democratic processes in Victoria out of their old seat of government
column3: The Ledge. Despite their relative stability and dominance on the islands
column4: they have had troubles bringing the many fractured realms and peoples of old Bee-Sea back into the fold. Legislators believe that only through the authority and mandate derived from The Crown can they find stability and prosperity. Legislative realms focus many of their resources on their fleets and navies
column5: seeing the Salish Sea as the lifeblood of their civilization. They tend to be very decentralized in their way of life; leaving individual communities largely to govern themselves
column6: and valuing the diversity within their lands.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: theosophy_DESC;The Theosophists are the followers of the Guru Krishnamurti
column2: a renowned sage who was said to be the last in a long line of Masters that shepherded the spiritual and intellectual development of humanity. According to their teachings
column3: it was when the world closed their hearts to the lessons of Krishnamurti that mankind grew distant from Nature and Truth
column4: relying more and more upon the various systems that they used to build the Old World
column5: before collapsing under the burden of ignorance and desire that it carried upon its back. Numerous legends even hold that Krishnamurti himself was alive to witness the Event
column6: spending his final years guiding the Theosophists through those dark days of turmoil and uncertainty. The Theosophists de emphasize the importance of organized religion
column9: and hierarchy as a source of direct enlightenment
column10: viewing them simply as roads for every individual to access the source of Truth. ;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: navegante_DESC;Navigants believe those who are brave
column2: those who are patient
column3: are blessed by the sea. Legends warn of the dangers and curses of the sea
column4: but also speak of miracles and blessings from he who multiplies the fish. Our Savior and provider
column5: call us to walk over the waters with you. And give us Our Daily Fish

column1: triangulo_dorado_DESC;Proclaiming being the true lords of Mexico the days before the event
column2: Contrabandistas cling to hubs of power and isolated fortresses. They believe laws and morals were suggestions
column3: their honor and pride shapes them
column4: and they are exempt if some good is done. They’re a brutal caste of tyrants
column5: idolizing feats of bravery as sung in Los Corridos. But the Event robbed their trade routes and their clients
column6: and now their power wanes. Are they really the lords of the land?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: misional_DESC;As Jesus and the Apostles healed by faith
column2: those gifted can work wonders through prayer and  intercession from El Niño Fidencio and San Chárbel. A wide range of beliefs
column3: but united by miracles and signs.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the heirs of the Sun
column3: an ancient tradition met the Gospel. Believing that at the end of the world those who were baptized were the only to be saved and inherit the world. These chosen are the proud Yaqui
column4: free from the colonists yet armed with their catholic traditions.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bohemian_DESC;Long has the name been known that even the Weavings Spiders wish not tread the ground of the Bohemians
column2: a secret society of grove-captains across the wooded estates of the powerful men of Pre-Event California it is said that their wise and terrible guardian the screeching owl of the Grove protects their proceedings for those that wish to pry within their most holy of holies. Those that do are said to meet their maker drowned in circumstances that have been lost to time.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
there is no reward. Those who refuse are destined to fade into obscurity
column3: never to join the High Rollers of old
column4: never to drink
column5: party
column6: and gamble forever in the splendor of the House. Wealth is the ultimate form of fortune
column7: the manifestation of Lady Luck’s favor. An extension of this premise
column8: any can rise to greatness if the Odds are in their favor
column9: from an all-conquering king to a peasant in the right place at the right time. The roll of the dice
column11: and the spin of the wheel. All are signs of Lady Luck’s presence
column12: and all are proof that our way is right.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: haysian_DESC;The Americans once crowded around great mirrors and scrying stones with religious compulsion
column2: and in the searing light of ancient magic they witnessed an endless series of rapturous wonders. Empires rose and fell in an hour
column3: lovers gasped and clung to each other with golden hair and red lips
column4: crooning dark-haired troubadours sang to their loves and faced off against jealous villains
column5: crag-faced warriors and conquerors reenacted stories written by men whose ancient bones were already dust. The glowing gods of Tragedia and Comedia strode through the electric dream-world in the flicker of magic lamps and gave color and life to dull muddy reality. This ancient art was practiced under the watchful eye of the Code of Hays
column6: tempering the excess and wildness of the celebrity-thespians and ensuring moral cleanliness and right-minded behavior. As they say

column2: It was said that all was a part of the grand accordance of the All-Go-Rhythm
column3: the song of the Universe composed by the Great Tek
column4: the law which binds all together. The Code for which is as old as it is arcane performed as a secret and sacred rite of “transfer” (Divination). Men who have heard the All-Go-Rhythm
column5: Diviners known as Eye-Tee
column6: are said to cravenly hold the secrets of the song inside their giant temples called “Mainframes” which house idols of “dayta” said to be spirits in service to Tek.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: wiccan_DESC;Wiccans are a diverse collection of occultist covens who
column2: while emerging shortly before the event
column3: claim to originate from a tradition of witchcraft who reach back to ancient times. While every coven has different practices
column4: the Wiccan faithful share a belief in the power of magic and in the Wiccan Rede - "An it harm none
column5: do what ye will";;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cowpoke_DESC;The Cowpokes worship a broad syncretic pantheon of deities redolent of the heroes of the ancient west of America
column2: headed by the Spirit of the West
column3: a transcendent being responsible for shepherding mankind to the Last Roundup
column4: though wicked souls are condemned to ride the skies forever
column5: chasing a herd of accursed cattle.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cowpoke_reformed_DESC;The Cowpokes worship a broad syncretic pantheon of deities redolent of the heroes of the ancient west of America
column2: headed by the Spirit of the West
column3: a transcendent being responsible for shepherding mankind to the Last Roundup
column4: though wicked souls are condemned to ride the skies forever
column5: chasing a herd of accursed cattle. Their traditions and heritage have been officially collected into a holy and codifying scripture.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: interstater_DESC;The Interstaters are the followers of the Guru Eisenhower
column2: the builder of the great ancient interstates of old America. They believe that after traveling "through Darkest America with Tank and Truck" their Champion Eisenhower transcended through understanding of the fine methods that brought unity amongst all people. It is this desire that led him to build the American Interstates with the aid of The Fund
column3: the Holy Paver
column4: and See-meant. The Interstaters believe that the fall of old America was caused by the neglect of Eisenhower's work
column5: for when the roads that brought unity amongst all Americans stopped working
column6: they began to see each other as foreign
column8: and a confusion of tongues quickly followed. This Infrastructure Cult places and high religious importance on unity between all men
column9: the breaking down of barriers that seperate them
column10: and the reverence of those things that keep them together.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: interstater_reformed_DESC;The Interstaters are the followers of the Guru Eisenhower
column2: the builder of the great ancient interstates of old America. They believe that after traveling "through Darkest America with Tank and Truck" their Champion Eisenhower transcended through understanding of the fine methods that brought unity amongst all people. It is this desire that led him to build the American Interstates with the aid of The Fund
column3: the Holy Paver
column4: and See-meant. The Interstaters believe that the fall of old America was caused by the neglect of Eisenhower's work
column5: for when the roads that brought unity amongst all Americans stopped working
column6: they began to see each other as foreign
column8: and a confusion of tongues quickly followed. This Infrastructure Cult places and high religious importance on unity between all men
column9: the breaking down of barriers that seperate them
column10: and the reverence of those things that keep them together. Their ways have been codified into a holy text.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: romano-humanism_DESC;This is a meme tier skeleton I made based around a specific music artist I was listening to as I did the code. Hopefully ya boi Mr. More comes and does a real one. Good music btw. -Idaho;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
scientology_DESC;The Scientologists jealously guard the communications and the revealed technology of their founder Chairman Hubbard. In their process and rituals they see authenticity
column2: true ethics and love of knowledge setting itself against the false implants that distract and torment the various un-clear peoples. Tortured souls come dripping down the unknown gulf of trillions of years into our own time
column3: where they fasten into the flesh and minds of living men and fester causing illness and madness. Scientologists believe that through the strictly controlled and monitored application of  Hubbard's knowledge and religious technology
column4: one can cleanse the flesh and mind with the goal of becoming true self-moving souls.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
